required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: CLEAR CARE® PLUS for Presbyopic Contact Lens Wearers
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Study of CLEAR CARE® PLUS for Presbyopic Contact Lens Wearers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate CLEAR CARE® PLUS (CCP) compared to non-HYDRAGLYDE® multi-purpose contact lens solutions in presbyopes currently wearing soft contact lenses and experiencing symptoms of dryness.

primary_outcome.measure: Contact Lens Dry Eye Questionnaire-8 (CLDEQ-8) Score at Day 30
primary_outcome.description: CLDEQ-8 score (assessment of contact lens discomfort) was obtained by adding the numerical responses to each of 8 items (range 1 to 37) collected at Day 30 for each product. A lower CLDEQ-8 score indicated less frequent or less intense symptoms.

arm_group.description: 3% hydrogen peroxide solution with HydraGlyde® Moisture Matrix contact lens solution in Period 1, followed by subject's habitual multi-purpose contact lens solution (HMPS) in Period 2. Each product used daily per packaging instructions with subject's habitual contact lenses for approximately 30 cleaning and disinfection cycles.

Subject's habitual multi-purpose contact lens solution in Period 1, followed by 3% hydrogen peroxide solution with HydraGlyde® Moisture Matrix contact lens solution in Period 2. Each product used daily per packaging instructions with subject's habitual contact lenses for approximately 30 cleaning and disinfection cycles.

intervention.intervention_name: 3% hydrogen peroxide solution with HydraGlyde® Moisture Matrix
intervention.description: For cleaning, disinfection and overnight storage of contact lenses
Participant's habitual contact lens brand worn in a daily wear modality for 30 days.

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Subjects were recruited from 9 study centers located in the United States.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Of the 126 enrolled, 5 subjects were exited as screen failures prior to randomization. This reporting group includes all randomized subjects (121).

group.title: CCP/HMPS
group.description: 3% hydrogen peroxide solution with HydraGlyde® Moisture Matrix contact lens solution (CCP) in Period 1, followed by subject's habitual multi-purpose contact lens solution (HMPS) in Period 2. Each product used daily per packaging instructions with subject's habitual contact lenses for approximately 30 cleaning and disinfection cycles.

group.title: HMPS/CCP
group.description: Subject's habitual multi-purpose contact lens solution in Period 1, followed by 3% hydrogen peroxide solution with HydraGlyde® Moisture Matrix contact lens solution in Period 2. Each product used daily per packaging instructions with subject's habitual contact lenses for approximately 30 cleaning and disinfection cycles.

baseline.population: This analysis set includes all randomized subjects who were exposed to at least one of the study lens care products evaluated in this study (Full Analysis Set).

group.title: Overall
group.description: 3% hydrogen peroxide solution with HydraGlyde® Moisture Matrix and subject's HMPS used during Period 1 and Period 2 in a crossover assignment.

category.title: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

outcome.title: Contact Lens Dry Eye Questionnaire-8 (CLDEQ-8) Score at Day 30
outcome.description: CLDEQ-8 score (assessment of contact lens discomfort) was obtained by adding the numerical responses to each of 8 items (range 1 to 37) collected at Day 30 for each product. A lower CLDEQ-8 score indicated less frequent or less intense symptoms.
outcome.population: Full Analysis Set with non-missing responses

group.title: CLEAR CARE PLUS
group.description: 3% hydrogen peroxide solution with HydraGlyde® Moisture Matrix contact lens solution used daily with subject's habitual contact lenses for approximately 30 cleaning and disinfection cycles.

group.title: HMPS
group.description: Subject's habitual multi-purpose contact lens solution used daily with subject's habitual contact lenses for approximately 30 cleaning and disinfection cycles.

measure.title: Contact Lens Dry Eye Questionnaire-8 (CLDEQ-8) Score at Day 30
measure.description: CLDEQ-8 score (assessment of contact lens discomfort) was obtained by adding the numerical responses to each of 8 items (range 1 to 37) collected at Day 30 for each product. A lower CLDEQ-8 score indicated less frequent or less intense symptoms.
measure.population: Full Analysis Set with non-missing responses

reported_events.time_frame: Day 1 through study completion, an average of 60 days
reported_events.desc: An AE was defined as any untoward medical occurrence, unintended disease or injury, or untoward clinical signs in subjects, users, or other persons, whether or not related to the investigational medical device. AEs were obtained through solicited and spontaneous comments from subjects and through observations by the Investigator.

group.title: CLEAR CARE PLUS
group.description: All subjects exposed to CCP contact lens solution

group.title: HMPS
group.description: All subjects exposed to habitual multi-purpose contact lens solution

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Sponsor reserves the right of prior review of any publication or presentation of information related to the study.
